title: Where is Spring 2018 Fantasy LCS???

embed.description: Fantasy LCS allows you to build a dream team of your favorite LCS players and battle your friends in head-to-head matches throughout each LCS split.

body: I go to the fantasy lcs page and I don't see any option to create a new league for the Spring 2018 split. It only shows my leagues from previous splits. Anyone know where to make one or if I can only have a certain amount of leagues? Can i restart one of my leagues?

replies.body: I'm not sure if it's just been delayed or anything like that, but be sure to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our game team can make sure we get all the details you need on what's coming up!
I've been looking for a few days on any news and your comment is the only official citing at all about what's going on with fantasy. Maybe let your bosses know we want some info
I am having the same issue. I submited a ticket as well.
